HttpServer_Exercise6Concurrent - Class in edu.escuelaing.arsw
Represents a concurrent HTTP server that handles client connections using a thread pool.

R

S

startServer(int) - Static method in class edu.escuelaing.arsw.HttpServer_Exercise6Concurrent
Starts the HTTP server on the specified port, accepting client connections and processing them using a fixed thread pool.
stopServer() - Static method in class edu.escuelaing.arsw.HttpServer_Exercise6Concurrent
Stops the HTTP server and shuts down the thread pool.
